ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE END OF THE UNIVERSE," Part One
A new, and possibly final (?!), storyline begins. As robots rise up all over the universe, overthrowing their human and alien persecutors, Telsa is faced with the ultimate decision: save Tim-21 or hand him over to her father and the United Galactic Council, which would end the war and uprising, but it would also be the end of Tim-21.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Dustin Nguyen | 1 | | B | Lil' Robot Cover B | Dustin Nguyen | 2 |
